TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ItemDragEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 为 和 控件的 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the event of the and controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户开始拖动某个项时发生该事件。The event occurs when the user begins dragging an item. 对象指定按下的鼠标按钮。An object specifies which mouse button was pressed. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了在 中启用拖放操作时的用法 。The following example illustrates the use of when enabling drag-and-drop operations within a . 属性确定是否应将拖动的节点移动或复制到其目标。The property determines whether the dragged node should be moved or copied to its destination. 然后，将由属性表示的节点 传递到 控件的方法，并 提供一个指示所需效果的值。The node, represented by the property, is then passed to the control's method along with a value indicating the desired effect. 有关完整的示例，请参阅 参考主题。For the complete example, see the reference topic. [!code-cpp[TreeViewDragDrop#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewDragDrop/CPP/treeviewdragdrop.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[TreeViewDragDrop#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewDragDrop/CS/treeviewdragdrop.cs#2)] [!code-vb[TreeViewDragDrop#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewDragDrop/VB/treeviewdragdrop.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示在拖动操作过程中按下的鼠标按钮。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates which mouse buttons were pressed during the drag operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使您能够确定在拖放操作过程中按下的鼠标按钮。This property enables you to determine which mouse buttons were pressed during a drag-and-drop operation. 此属性的值可用于正确确定应执行拖放操作的方式。The value of this property can be used to properly determine how the drag-and drop-operation should be performed. 例如，你可能想要在按下鼠标左键时将项目移动到新位置，并在按下鼠标右键时将其复制到新位置。For example, you might want to move an item to a new location when the left mouse button is pressed, and copy it to the new location when the right mouse button is pressed. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了在 控件中启用拖放操作时，如何使用类 。The following example illustrates the use of the class when you enable drag-and-drop operations within a control. 属性确定是否应将拖动的节点移动或复制到其目标。The property determines whether the dragged node should be moved or copied to its destination. 然后，将由属性表示的节点 传递到 控件的 方法，并提供一个指示拖放操作的预期效果的值。The node, represented by the property, is then passed to the control's method, along with a value that indicates the desired effect of the drag-and-drop operation. 有关完整的示例，请参阅 参考主题。For the complete example, see the reference topic. [!code-cpp[TreeViewDragDrop#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewDragDrop/CPP/treeviewdragdrop.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[TreeViewDragDrop#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewDragDrop/CS/treeviewdragdrop.cs#2)] [!code-vb[TreeViewDragDrop#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewDragDrop/VB/treeviewdragdrop.vb#2)]

span.span: Gets the item that is being dragged.

value.span: 表示正被拖动的项的对象。

span.span: An object that represents the item being dragged.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此属性来确定从 控件拖动或控件中的哪个项 。You can use this property to determine which item from the or controls is being dragged from the control. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了 在控件中启用拖放操作时的用法 。The following example illustrates the use of when enabling drag-and-drop operations within a control. 属性确定是否应将拖动的节点移动或复制到其目标。The property determines whether the dragged node should be moved or copied to its destination. 然后，将由属性表示的节点 传递到 控件的方法，并 提供一个指示拖放操作的预期效果的值。The node, represented by the property, is then passed to the control's method along with a value that indicates the desired effect of the drag-and-drop operation. 有关完整的示例，请参阅 参考主题。For the complete example, see the reference topic.
